DataSourceDefinition.Name: REP-068
DataSourceDefinition.Expression: SELECT PAIS, MARCA, CANAL, ANIO_PERI, ANIO_ACTUAL, SUBGV, REGION, ZONA, SUM(ACTIVAS_INI_FVP) AS ACTIVAS_INI_FVP, SUM(VENTA_FVP) AS VENTA_FVP, SUM(VENTA_FVP_USS) AS VENTA_FVP_USS, SUM(INGRESOS_FVP) AS INGRESOS_FVP, SUM(REINGRESOS_FVP) AS REINGRESOS_FVP, SUM(EGRESOS_FVP) AS EGRESOS_FVP, SUM(ENTREGADAS_FVP) AS ENTREGADAS_FVP, SUM(RECIBIDAS_FVP) AS RECIBIDAS_FVP, SUM(CAPITALIZACION_FVP) AS CAPITALIZACION_FVP, SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_FVP) AS ACTIVAS_FINALES_FVP, AVG(PPU_FVP) AS PPU_FVP, AVG(PSP_FVP) AS PSP_FVP, AVG(PUP_FVP) AS PUP_FVP, AVG(POP_FVP) AS POP_FVP, SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS_FVP) AS NRO_PEDIDOS_FVP, SUM(NRO_ORDENES_FVP) AS NRO_ORDENES_FVP, DECODE(SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_FVP),0,0,(SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS_FVP) / SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_FVP))*100) AS ACTIVIDAD_FVP, SUM(ACTIVAS_INI_AA) AS ACTIVAS_INI_AA, SUM(VENTA_AA) AS VENTA_AA, SUM(VENTA_AA_USS) AS VENTA_AA_USS, SUM(INGRESOS_AA) AS INGRESOS_AA, SUM(REINGRESOS_AA) AS REINGRESOS_AA, SUM(EGRESOS_AA) AS EGRESOS_AA, SUM(ENTREGADAS_AA) AS ENTREGADAS_AA, SUM(RECIBIDAS_AA) AS RECIBIDAS_AA, SUM(CAPITALIZACION_AA) AS CAPITALIZACION_AA, SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_AA) AS ACTIVAS_FINALES_AA, AVG(PPU_AA) AS PPU_AA, AVG(PSP_AA) AS PSP_AA, AVG(PUP_AA) AS PUP_AA, AVG(POP_AA) AS POP_AA, SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS_AA) AS NRO_PEDIDOS_AA, SUM(NRO_ORDENES_AA) AS NRO_ORDENES_AA, DECODE(SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_AA),0,0,(SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS_AA) / SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_AA))*100) AS ACTIVIDAD_AA, SUM(ACTIVAS_INI) AS ACTIVAS_INI, SUM(VENTA) AS VENTA, SUM(VENTA_USS) AS VENTA_USS, SUM(INGRESOS) AS INGRESOS, SUM(REINGRESOS) AS REINGRESOS, SUM(EGRESOS) AS EGRESOS, SUM(ENTREGADAS) AS ENTREGADAS, SUM(RECIBIDAS) AS RECIBIDAS, SUM(CAPITALIZACION) AS CAPITALIZACION, SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES) AS ACTIVAS_FINALES, AVG(PPU) AS PPU, AVG(PSP) AS PSP, AVG(PUP) AS PUP, AVG(POP) AS POP, SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS) AS NRO_PEDIDOS, SUM(NRO_ORDENES) AS NRO_ORDENES, DECODE(SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES),0,0,(SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS) / SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES))*100) AS ACTIVIDAD, DECODE(SUM(ACTIVAS_INI_FVP),0,0,(SUM(ACTIVAS_INI_AA) - SUM(ACTIVAS_INI_FVP))*100 / SUM(ACTIVAS_INI_FVP)) ACTIVAS_INI_VAR_FVP, DECODE(SUM(ACTIVAS_INI),0,0,(SUM(ACTIVAS_INI_AA) - SUM(ACTIVAS_INI))*100 / SUM(ACTIVAS_INI)) ACTIVAS_INI_VAR_AA, DECODE(SUM(VENTA_FVP),0,0,(SUM(VENTA_AA) - SUM(VENTA_FVP))*100 / SUM(VENTA_FVP)) VENTA_VAR_FVP, DECODE(SUM(VENTA),0,0,(SUM(VENTA_AA) - SUM(VENTA))*100 / SUM(VENTA)) VENTA_VAR_AA, DECODE(SUM(INGRESOS_FVP),0,0,(SUM(INGRESOS_AA) - SUM(INGRESOS_FVP))*100 / SUM(INGRESOS_FVP)) INGRESOS_VAR_FVP, DECODE(SUM(INGRESOS),0,0,(SUM(INGRESOS_AA) - SUM(INGRESOS))*100 / SUM(INGRESOS)) INGRESOS_VAR_AA, DECODE(SUM(REINGRESOS_FVP),0,0,(SUM(REINGRESOS_AA) - SUM(REINGRESOS_FVP))*100 / SUM(INGRESOS_FVP)) REINGRESOS_VAR_FVP, DECODE(SUM(REINGRESOS),0,0,(SUM(REINGRESOS_AA) - SUM(REINGRESOS))*100 / SUM(REINGRESOS)) REINGRESOS_VAR_AA, DECODE(SUM(EGRESOS_FVP),0,0,(SUM(EGRESOS_AA) - SUM(EGRESOS_FVP))*100 / SUM(EGRESOS_FVP)) EGRESOS_VAR_FVP, DECODE(SUM(EGRESOS),0,0,(SUM(EGRESOS_AA) - SUM(EGRESOS))*100 / SUM(EGRESOS)) EGRESOS_VAR_AA, DECODE(SUM(ENTREGADAS_FVP),0,0,(SUM(ENTREGADAS_AA) - SUM(ENTREGADAS_FVP))*100 / SUM(ENTREGADAS_FVP)) ENTREGADAS_VAR_FVP, DECODE(SUM(ENTREGADAS),0,0,(SUM(ENTREGADAS_AA) - SUM(ENTREGADAS))*100 / SUM(ENTREGADAS)) ENTREGADAS_VAR_AA, DECODE(SUM(RECIBIDAS_FVP),0,0,(SUM(RECIBIDAS_AA) - SUM(RECIBIDAS_FVP))*100 / SUM(RECIBIDAS_FVP)) RECIBIDAS_VAR_FVP, DECODE(SUM(RECIBIDAS),0,0,(SUM(RECIBIDAS_AA) - SUM(RECIBIDAS))*100 / SUM(RECIBIDAS)) RECIBIDAS_VAR_AA, DECODE(SUM(CAPITALIZACION_FVP),0,0,(SUM(CAPITALIZACION_AA) - SUM(CAPITALIZACION_FVP))*100 / SUM(CAPITALIZACION_FVP)) CAPITALIZACION_VAR_FVP, DECODE(SUM(CAPITALIZACION),0,0,(SUM(CAPITALIZACION_AA) - SUM(CAPITALIZACION))*100 / SUM(CAPITALIZACION)) CAPITALIZACION_VAR_AA, DECODE(SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_FVP),0,0,(SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_AA) - SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_FVP))*100 / SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_FVP)) ACTIVAS_FINALES_VAR_FVP, DECODE(SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES),0,0,(SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_AA) - SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES))*100 / SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES)) ACTIVAS_FINALES_VAR_AA, DECODE(SUM(PPU_FVP),0,0,(SUM(PPU_AA) - SUM(PPU_FVP))*100 / SUM(PPU_FVP)) PPU_VAR_FVP, DECODE(SUM(PPU),0,0,(SUM(PPU_AA) - SUM(PPU))*100 / SUM(PPU)) PPU_VAR_AA, DECODE(SUM(PSP_FVP),0,0,(SUM(PSP_AA) - SUM(PSP_FVP))*100 / SUM(PSP_FVP)) PSP_VAR_FVP, DECODE(SUM(PSP),0,0,(SUM(PSP_AA) - SUM(PSP))*100 / SUM(PSP)) PSP_VAR_AA, DECODE(SUM(PUP_FVP),0,0,(SUM(PUP_AA) - SUM(PUP_FVP))*100 / SUM(PUP_FVP)) PUP_VAR_FVP, DECODE(SUM(PUP),0,0,(SUM(PUP_AA) - SUM(PUP))*100 / SUM(PUP)) PUP_VAR_AA, DECODE(SUM(POP_FVP),0,0,(SUM(POP_AA) - SUM(POP_FVP))*100 / SUM(POP_FVP)) POP_VAR_FVP, DECODE(SUM(POP),0,0,(SUM(POP_AA) - SUM(POP))*100 / SUM(POP)) POP_VAR_AA, DECODE(SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS_FVP),0,0,(SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS_AA) - SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS_FVP))*100 / SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS_FVP)) NRO_PEDIDOS_VAR_FVP, DECODE(SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS),0,0,(SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS_AA) - SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS))*100 / SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS)) NRO_PEDIDOS_VAR_AA, DECODE(SUM(NRO_ORDENES_FVP),0,0,(SUM(NRO_ORDENES_AA) - SUM(NRO_ORDENES_FVP))*100 / SUM(NRO_ORDENES_FVP)) NRO_ORDENES_VAR_FVP, DECODE(SUM(NRO_ORDENES),0,0,(SUM(NRO_ORDENES_AA) - SUM(NRO_ORDENES))*100 / SUM(NRO_ORDENES)) NRO_ORDENES_VAR_AA, DECODE(DECODE(SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_FVP),0,0,(SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS_FVP) / SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_FVP))*100),0,0,(DECODE(SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_AA),0,0,(SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS_AA) / SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_AA))*100) - DECODE(SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_FVP),0,0,(SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS_FVP) / SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_FVP))*100))*100 / DECODE(SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_FVP),0,0,(SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS_FVP) / SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_FVP))*100)) ACTIVIDAD_VAR_FVP, DECODE(DECODE(SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES),0,0,(SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS) / SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES))*100),0,0,(DECODE(SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_AA),0,0,(SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS_AA) / SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES_AA))*100) - DECODE(SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES),0,0,(SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS) / SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES))*100))*100 / DECODE(SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES),0,0,(SUM(NRO_PEDIDOS) / SUM(ACTIVAS_FINALES))*100)) ACTIVIDAD_VAR_AA FROM ( SELECT GEN_PAIS.PAIS, MARCA.DES_MARC AS MARCA, GEN_CANAL.CANAL, PERI.VAL_NOMB_PERI, %value_ANIOVALUE% AS ANIO_PERI, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') AS ANIO_ACTUAL, SUBGV.DES_SUBG_VENT AS SUBGV, REG.DES_REGI AS REGION, ZON.DES_ZONA AS Zona, MET.NUM_ACTI_INIC AS ACTIVAS_INI_FVP, MET.IMP_VENT_NETA_ESTA AS VENTA_FVP, MET.IMP_VENT_NETA_ESTA AS VENTA_FVP_USS, MET.IMP_INGR AS INGRESOS_FVP, MET.IMP_REIN AS REINGRESOS_FVP, MET.IMP_EGRE AS EGRESOS_FVP, MET.NUM_ENTR AS ENTREGADAS_FVP, MET.NUM_RECI AS RECIBIDAS_FVP, MET.IMP_CAPI AS CAPITALIZACION_FVP, MET.NUM_ACTI_FINA AS ACTIVAS_FINALES_FVP, MET.NUM_PEDI AS NRO_PEDIDOS_FVP, MET.NUM_ORDE AS NRO_ORDENES_FVP, MET.IMP_PREC_PROM_UNIT AS PPU_FVP, MET.VAL_PROM_VENT_PEDI AS PSP_FVP, MET.VAL_PROM_UNID_PEDI AS PUP_FVP, MET.VAL_PROM_ORDE_PEDI AS POP_FVP, VAR_AA.NUM_ACTI_INIC AS ACTIVAS_INI_AA, VAR_AA.NUM_ACTI_FINA AS ACTIVAS_FINALES_AA, VAR_AA.IMP_INGR AS INGRESOS_AA, VAR_AA.IMP_REIN AS REINGRESOS_AA, VAR_AA.IMP_EGRE AS EGRESOS_AA, VAR_AA.NUM_ORDE AS NRO_ORDENES_AA, VAR_AA.NUM_PEDI AS NRO_PEDIDOS_AA, VAR_AA.IMP_VENT_NETA_ESTA AS VENTA_AA, VAR_AA.IMP_VENT_NETA_ESTA AS VENTA_AA_USS, VAR_AA.VAL_CAPI CAPITALIZACION_AA, VAR_AA.IMP_PREC_MEDI_UNIT AS PPU_AA, VAR_AA.VAL_PROM_VENT_PEDI AS PSP_AA, VAR_AA.VAL_PROM_UNID_PEDI AS PUP_AA, VAR_AA.VAL_PROM_ORDE_PEDI AS POP_AA, VAR_AA.NUM_ENTR AS ENTREGADAS_AA, VAR_AA.NUM_RECI AS RECIBIDAS_AA, VAR.NUM_ACTI_INIC AS ACTIVAS_INI, VAR.NUM_ACTI_FINA AS ACTIVAS_FINALES, VAR.IMP_INGR AS INGRESOS, VAR.IMP_REIN AS REINGRESOS, VAR.IMP_EGRE AS EGRESOS, VAR.NUM_ORDE AS NRO_ORDENES, VAR.NUM_PEDI AS NRO_PEDIDOS, VAR.IMP_VENT_NETA_ESTA AS VENTA, VAR.IMP_VENT_NETA_ESTA AS VENTA_USS, VAR.VAL_CAPI CAPITALIZACION, VAR.IMP_PREC_MEDI_UNIT AS PPU, VAR.VAL_PROM_VENT_PEDI AS PSP, VAR.VAL_PROM_UNID_PEDI AS PUP, VAR.VAL_PROM_ORDE_PEDI AS POP, VAR.NUM_ENTR AS ENTREGADAS, VAR.NUM_RECI AS RECIBIDAS FROM ZON_SUB_GEREN_VENTA SUBGV, ZON_REGIO REG, ZON_ZONA ZON, SEG_MARCA MARCA, ( SELECT V.VAL_OID, V.VAL_I18N AS PAIS FROM V_GEN_I18N_SICC V WHERE V.ATTR_ENTI = 'SEG_PAIS' AND V.IDIO_OID_IDIO = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% AND V.ATTR_NUM_ATRI = 1 ) GEN_PAIS, ( SELECT V.VAL_OID, V.VAL_I18N AS CANAL FROM V_GEN_I18N_SICC V WHERE V.ATTR_ENTI = 'SEG_CANAL' AND V.IDIO_OID_IDIO = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% AND V.ATTR_NUM_ATRI = 1 ) GEN_CANAL, ( SELECT PERI.OID_PERI AS OID_PERI_PERI, P.OID_PERI AS OID_PERI_REFE, PERI.PAIS_OID_PAIS, PERI.MARC_OID_MARC, PERI.CANA_OID_CANA, PERI.VAL_NOMB_PERI FROM SEG_PERIO_CORPO CORPO, CRA_PERIO PERI, SEG_PERIO_CORPO REFE, CRA_PERIO P WHERE PERI.PERI_OID_PERI = CORPO.OID_PERI AND REFE.VAL_ANIO = %value_ANIOVALUE% AND CORPO.VAL_ANIO = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') %start_PERIODOVALUES% AND PERI.OID_PERI IN (%value_PERIODOVALUES%) %end_PERIODOVALUES% AND SUBSTR(REFE.COD_PERI,-2) = SUBSTR(CORPO.COD_PERI,-2) AND P.PERI_OID_PERI = REFE.OID_PERI AND PERI.PAIS_OID_PAIS = P.PAIS_OID_PAIS AND PERI.MARC_OID_MARC = P.MARC_OID_MARC AND PERI.CANA_OID_CANA = P.CANA_OID_CANA ) PERI, ( SELECT ZONA.ZORG_OID_REGI, ZONA.OID_ZONA, MET.PERD_OID_PERI, SUM(RES.NUM_ACTI_INIC) AS NUM_ACTI_INIC, SUM(RES.NUM_ACTI_FINA) AS NUM_ACTI_FINA, SUM(RES.IMP_INGR) AS IMP_INGR, SUM(RES.IMP_REIN) AS IMP_REIN, SUM(RES.IMP_EGRE) AS IMP_EGRE, SUM(RES.NUM_ORDE) AS NUM_ORDE, SUM(RES.NUM_PEDI) AS NUM_PEDI, SUM(RES.NUM_UNID_VEND) AS NUM_UNID_VEND, SUM(RES.NUM_CLIE) AS NUM_CLIE, SUM(RES.IMP_VENT_NETA_ESTA) AS IMP_VENT_NETA_ESTA, SUM(RES.VAL_CAPI) AS VAL_CAPI, SUM(RES.VAL_ACTI) AS VAL_ACTI, SUM(RES.IMP_PREC_MEDI_UNIT) AS IMP_PREC_MEDI_UNIT, SUM(RES.VAL_PROM_VENT_PEDI) AS VAL_PROM_VENT_PEDI, SUM(RES.VAL_PROM_UNID_PEDI) AS VAL_PROM_UNID_PEDI, SUM(RES.VAL_PROM_ORDE_PEDI) AS VAL_PROM_ORDE_PEDI, SUM(RES.VAL_RETE) AS VAL_RETE, SUM(RES.NUM_ENTR) AS NUM_ENTR, SUM(RES.NUM_RECI) AS NUM_RECI FROM INC_METAS_VENTA_PROYE_ZONA MET, INC_RESUL_VENTA_PROYE_ZONA RES, ZON_ZONA ZONA WHERE RES.MVPZ_OID_META_VENT_PROY_ZONA = MET.OID_META_VENT_PROY_ZONA AND MET.ZZON_OID_ZONA = ZONA.OID_ZONA GROUP BY ZONA.ZORG_OID_REGI, ZONA.OID_ZONA, MET.PERD_OID_PERI ) VAR, ( SELECT ZONA.ZORG_OID_REGI, ZONA.OID_ZONA, MET.PERD_OID_PERI, SUM(RES.NUM_ACTI_INIC) AS NUM_ACTI_INIC, SUM(RES.NUM_ACTI_FINA) AS NUM_ACTI_FINA, SUM(RES.IMP_INGR) AS IMP_INGR, SUM(RES.IMP_REIN) AS IMP_REIN, SUM(RES.IMP_EGRE) AS IMP_EGRE, SUM(RES.NUM_ORDE) AS NUM_ORDE, SUM(RES.NUM_PEDI) AS NUM_PEDI, SUM(RES.NUM_UNID_VEND) AS NUM_UNID_VEND, SUM(RES.NUM_CLIE) AS NUM_CLIE, SUM(RES.IMP_VENT_NETA_ESTA) AS IMP_VENT_NETA_ESTA, SUM(RES.VAL_CAPI) AS VAL_CAPI, SUM(RES.VAL_ACTI) AS VAL_ACTI, SUM(RES.IMP_PREC_MEDI_UNIT) AS IMP_PREC_MEDI_UNIT, SUM(RES.VAL_PROM_VENT_PEDI) AS VAL_PROM_VENT_PEDI, SUM(RES.VAL_PROM_UNID_PEDI) AS VAL_PROM_UNID_PEDI, SUM(RES.VAL_PROM_ORDE_PEDI) AS VAL_PROM_ORDE_PEDI, SUM(RES.VAL_RETE) AS VAL_RETE, SUM(RES.NUM_ENTR) AS NUM_ENTR, SUM(RES.NUM_RECI) AS NUM_RECI FROM INC_METAS_VENTA_PROYE_ZONA MET, INC_RESUL_VENTA_PROYE_ZONA RES, ZON_ZONA ZONA WHERE RES.MVPZ_OID_META_VENT_PROY_ZONA = MET.OID_META_VENT_PROY_ZONA AND MET.ZZON_OID_ZONA = ZONA.OID_ZONA GROUP BY ZONA.ZORG_OID_REGI, ZONA.OID_ZONA, MET.PERD_OID_PERI ) VAR_AA, ( SELECT ZONA.ZORG_OID_REGI, ZONA.OID_ZONA, MET.PERD_OID_PERI, SUM(MET.NUM_ACTI_INIC) AS NUM_ACTI_INIC, SUM(MET.NUM_ACTI_FINA) AS NUM_ACTI_FINA, SUM(MET.IMP_INGR) AS IMP_INGR, SUM(MET.IMP_REIN) AS IMP_REIN, SUM(MET.IMP_EGRE) AS IMP_EGRE, SUM(MET.NUM_ORDE) AS NUM_ORDE, SUM(MET.NUM_PEDI) AS NUM_PEDI, SUM(MET.NUM_UNID_VEND) AS NUM_UNID_VEND, SUM(MET.NUM_CLIE) AS NUM_CLIE, SUM(MET.IMP_VENT_NETA_ESTA) AS IMP_VENT_NETA_ESTA, SUM(MET.IMP_CAPI) AS IMP_CAPI, SUM(MET.IMP_PREC_PROM_UNIT) AS IMP_PREC_PROM_UNIT, SUM(MET.VAL_PROM_VENT_PEDI) AS VAL_PROM_VENT_PEDI, SUM(MET.VAL_PROM_UNID_PEDI) AS VAL_PROM_UNID_PEDI, SUM(MET.VAL_PROM_ORDE_PEDI) AS VAL_PROM_ORDE_PEDI, SUM(MET.NUM_ENTR) AS NUM_ENTR, SUM(MET.NUM_RECI) AS NUM_RECI FROM INC_METAS_VENTA_PROYE_ZONA MET, ZON_ZONA ZONA WHERE MET.ZZON_OID_ZONA = ZONA.OID_ZONA GROUP BY ZONA.ZORG_OID_REGI, ZONA.OID_ZONA, MET.PERD_OID_PERI ) MET WHERE REG.ZSGV_OID_SUBG_VENT = SUBGV.OID_SUBG_VENT AND ZON.ZORG_OID_REGI = REG.OID_REGI AND PERI.MARC_OID_MARC = MARCA.OID_MARC AND PERI.PAIS_OID_PAIS = %value_PAISVALUE% AND PERI.MARC_OID_MARC = %value_MARCAVALUE% AND PERI.CANA_OID_CANA = %value_CANALVALUE% %start_SUBGERENCIAVENTAVALUES% AND REG.ZSGV_OID_SUBG_VENT IN (%value_SUBGERENCIAVENTAVALUES%) %end_SUBGERENCIAVENTAVALUES% %start_REGIONVALUES% AND reg.oid_regi IN (%value_REGIONVALUES%) %end_REGIONVALUES% %start_ZONAVALUES% AND zon.OID_ZONA IN (%value_ZONAVALUES%) %end_ZONAVALUES% AND PERI.PAIS_OID_PAIS = GEN_PAIS.VAL_OID(+) AND PERI.CANA_OID_CANA = GEN_CANAL.VAL_OID(+) AND MET.OID_ZONA = ZON.OID_ZONA AND MET.PERD_OID_PERI = PERI.OID_PERI_PERI AND VAR_AA.PERD_OID_PERI = MET.PERD_OID_PERI AND VAR_AA.OID_ZONA = MET.OID_ZONA AND VAR.PERD_OID_PERI = PERI.OID_PERI_REFE AND VAR.OID_ZONA = MET.OID_ZONA ) GROUP BY PAIS, MARCA, CANAL, ANIO_PERI, ANIO_ACTUAL, SUBGV, REGION, ZONA
